Name: Destructo
About the game: Destructo is a destruction sandbox located in imaginary Kaira City. The player must search for weapons, ammo and collectibles while destroying buildings, cars etc. Finding all the collectible items and scoring enough points unlocks new game modes and customization options. Four game modes Normal: Search for weapons and collectibles, cause destruction Survival: Survive the missile attack as long as possible while collecting bonuses Time attack: Cause as much destruction as possible in two minutes God mode: Infinite ammo, immortality and ability to use bullet time Dynamic building destruction No scripted or precalculated destruction events. Different weapons Bunch of powerful weapons including M203 grenade launcher, laser guided missiles, a tank and more. Character customization Unlockable gloves and sleeves with color editor. Night map variants in survival and god mode Enjoy the fireworks in the night time. Authentic gun and explosion sounds Gun and explosions sounds are edited from the real world recordings.
